I'm a PhD student at the [Université de Lorraine](https://www.univ-lorraine.fr/), focusing on the bioinformatic side of ecotoxicology.

My research centers on improving transcriptomics data analysis in dose-response and time-dose-response frameworks, with the goal of creating reproducible, accessible, and tailored tools for the (eco)toxicology community. These tools aim to enhance hypothesis generation and experimental planning.

I conduct my research between the [Laboratoire Interdisciplinaire des Environnements (LIEC)](https://liec.univ-lorraine.fr/) in Metz and the [Laboratoire de Biométrie et Biologie Évolutive (LBBE)](https://lbbe-web.univ-lyon1.fr/fr) in Lyon.

I'm passionate about creating ✨ magic ✨ with `R`, `Quarto` and other tools that promote **reproducible research**.
